channel.title: Adding items to a 562 Rsps
channel.description:
well basically its easy
Requirements:562client loading 602 cache (Deob's 562 loading 602) works fine and a jkd Difficulty:1/10 ( 9999999/10 if you dont have a brain) Places Editing:ItemDefinition.xml
ok so im going to do an example of chaotic maul
first go to item definition.xml that can be located in data then add this any where: [code] <itemDefinition> <price> <minPrice>0</minPrice> <maxPrice>0</maxPrice> <normPrice>0</normPrice> </price> <bonus> <int>-4</int> <int>-4</int> <int>167</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>155</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonus> <examine>Chaotic Maul</examine> <id>18535</id> <stackable>false</stackable> <name>Chaotic maul</name> <noted>false</noted> <equipId>754</equipId> </itemDefinition>[/code]
save compile then run your server then do item 18353 and you have a chaotic maul. make sure you are using the 562 loading 602 client so the maul loads up
if you need any hep just leave a comment

item.title: Adding items to a 562 Rsps
item.dc:creator: @samuelclark samuelclark
item.description:
@samuelclark wrote:

well basically its easy

Requirements:562client loading 602 cache (Deob’s 562 loading 602) works fine and a jkd
Difficulty:1/10 ( 9999999/10 if you dont have a brain)
Places Editing:ItemDefinition.xml

ok so im going to do an example of chaotic maul

first go to item definition.xml that can be located in data
then add this any where:

<itemDefinition> <price> <minPrice>0</minPrice> <maxPrice>0</maxPrice> <normPrice>0</normPrice> </price> <bonus> <int>-4</int> <int>-4</int> <int>167</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>155</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonus> <examine>Chaotic Maul</examine> <id>18535</id> <stackable>false</stackable> <name>Chaotic maul</name> <noted>false</noted> <equipId>754</equipId> </itemDefinition>

save compile then run your server then do item 18353 and you have a chaotic maul. make sure you are using the 562 loading 602 client so the maul loads up

if you need any hep just leave a comment

Read full topic
